history.content:
Spring 2016 course grades will be listed on the transcript around June 3rd. At that time, you can request a "Certificate of Completion" documenting that you have completed a degree. Spring 2016 degrees should be conferred on the transcript in August, and diplomas will arrive around early October. These dates can all be clarified by the Office of the Registrar (510-664-9181).


Typically employers know that a large institution can not document your degree at the time you finish your coursework, and that this process takes a couple of months. In my experience, a Certificate of Completion works for most employers, except TFA and to qualify for the Accounting test.

Spring 2016 course grades will be listed on the transcript around June 3rd. At that time, you can request a "Certificate of Completion" documenting that you have completed a degree. Spring 2016 degrees should be conferred on the transcript in August, and diplomas will arrive around early October. These dates can all be clarified by the Office of the Registrar (510-642-9181).


Typically employers know that a large institution can not document your degree at the time you finish your coursework, and that this process takes a couple of months. In my experience, a Certificate of Completion works for most employers, except TFA and to qualify for the Accounting test.

I am graduating in May 2016 in EECS but I can't start working at my future job until my official transcript or degree is ready to send to my employer.

I have to decide my start date, and I want to start as early as possible.
When are our official transcripts or degrees ready after graduation?
history.subject: Official transcript/degree after graduation?
